title: Issue with install

labels.name: howtousedlc
labels.description: issue regarding the use of DeepLabCut

body:
**Windows 10 64bit**
Anaconda env with DeepLabCut 2.0

activated WindowsGPU environment
tried to install with pip install deeplabcut, most downloads and unpacking seemed to go fine,
then got the following text (same with multiple repeats)


```
...
Collecting ruamel.yaml==0.15 (from deeplabcut)
  Using cached https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/10/aa/f31c8a858e23fe5b14c59e6a03ae80b4cb76353c184df48a582a55eb2674/ruamel.yaml-0.15.0.tar.gz
    ERROR: Complete output from command python setup.py egg_info:
    ERROR: Warning: 'keywords' should be a list, got type 'NoneType'
    Traceback (most recent call last):
      File "<string>", line 1, in <module>
      File "C:\Users\HIGLEY~1\AppData\Local\Temp\pip-install-a361edo2\ruamel.yaml\setup.py", line 858, in <module>
        main()
      File "C:\Users\HIGLEY~1\AppData\Local\Temp\pip-install-a361edo2\ruamel.yaml\setup.py", line 847, in main
        setup(**kw)
      File "C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\envs\dlc-windowsGPU\lib\site-packages\setuptools\__init__.py", line 145, in setup
        return distutils.core.setup(**attrs)
      File "C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\envs\dlc-windowsGPU\lib\distutils\core.py", line 108, in setup
        _setup_distribution = dist = klass(attrs)
      File "C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\envs\dlc-windowsGPU\lib\site-packages\setuptools\dist.py", line 444, in __init__
        k: v for k, v in attrs.items()
      File "C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\envs\dlc-windowsGPU\lib\distutils\dist.py", line 267, in __init__
        getattr(self.metadata, "set_" + key)(val)
      File "C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\envs\dlc-windowsGPU\lib\distutils\dist.py", line 1203, in set_keywords
        self.keywords = _ensure_list(value, 'keywords')
      File "C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\envs\dlc-windowsGPU\lib\distutils\dist.py", line 40, in _ensure_list
        value = list(value)
    TypeError: 'NoneType' object is not iterable
    ----------------------------------------
ERROR: Command "python setup.py egg_info" failed with error code 1 in C:\Users\HIGLEY~1\AppData\Local\Temp\pip-install-a361edo2\ruamel.yaml\
```

thanks for any help!
mike
